title: Epidemic Simulation
description: The main purpose of this simulation is to model the spread of an epidemic in a city with 1000 people.

interactions.name: Interaction
interactions.description: A person can interact with other persons, potentially spreading or contracting the epidemic.

metrics.name: total_infected
metrics.description: Total number of people infected over the course of the simulation.

metrics.name: total_recovered
metrics.description: Total number of people recovered over the course of the simulation.

metrics.name: total_deceased
metrics.description: Total number of people deceased due to the epidemic over the course of the simulation.

validation_criteria.name: Real World Comparison
validation_criteria.description: The simulation's accuracy should be evaluated by comparing its results with real-world data, such as the spread of a similar epidemic in a similarly-sized city.
